text: The Bear () is a 1938 Soviet drama movie directed by Isidor Annensky.МедведьРасписание недели It stars Olga Androvskaya, Mikhail Zharov, and Ivan Pelttser. == Actors == * Olga Androvskaya as Yelena Ivanovna Popova * Mikhail Zharov as Grigori Stepanovich Smirnov * Ivan Pelttser as Luka, the servant (as I. Pelttser) * Konstantin Sorokin == References == ==Other websites== * Category:1938 comedy movies Category:1938 drama movies Category:1930s comedy-drama movies Category:Movies directed by Isidor Annensky Category:Soviet comedy movies Category:Soviet drama movies
title: The Bear (1938 movie)
